sentence.Network_en: Evil is the inverse of good.
There is no sign that you bothered to consider the inverse of your logic.
sentence.Network_cn: 你根本就不想把你的逻辑反过来考虑。

sentence.Network_en: The hologram can be flipped to show the inverse image.
sentence.Network_cn: 全息图可以通过反转显现出逆像。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin inversus, past participle of invertere (see invert)

encyclopedia.content: Hibernate中的inverse在表关系映射中经常应用， inverse的值有两种，“true”和“false”。inverse="false"是默认的值，如果设置为true 则表示对象的状态变化不会同步到数据库 ;设置成false则相反； inverse的作用：在hibernate中是通过inverse的设置来决定是有谁来维护表和表之间的关系的。 我们说inverse设立不当会导致性能低下，其实是说inverse设立不当，会产生多余重复的SQL语句甚至致使JDBC exception的throw。这

entry.tran: 相反的;成反比的;相逆的
entry.def: If there is an inverse relationship between two things, one of them becomes larger as the other becomes smaller.

example.ex: The tension grew in inverse proportion to the distance from their final destination.
example.tran: 拉力的大小与他们离终点的距离成反比。

entry.def: The inverse of something is its exact opposite.

example.ex: There is no sign that you bothered to consider the inverse of your logic.
example.tran: 你根本就不想把你的逻辑反过来考虑。

means.word_mean: 1. something inverted in sequence or character or effect;

sentences.sentence: "when the direct approach failed he tried the inverse"

means.word_mean: 1. reversed (turned backward) in order or nature or effect
2. opposite in nature or effect or relation to another quantity ;

sentences.sentence: "a term is in inverse proportion to another term if it increases (or decreases) as the other decreases (or increases)"

auth_sentence.content: It was like an inverse of Braess's paradox.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was like an inverse of Braess's paradox.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was like an inverse of Braess's paradox.

auth_sentence.content: Inverse ETFs try to achieve the opposite performance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inverse ETFs try to achieve the opposite performance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inverse ETFs try to achieve the opposite performance.

auth_sentence.content: She says inverse ETFs work only in sharply declining markets.
auth_sentence.res_content: She says inverse ETFs work only in sharply declining markets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She says inverse ETFs work only in sharply declining markets.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad向+vers转+e→转向不利的
a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vers转+atile→玩得转,有才能的
vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐
stems_affixes.word_buile: di离开+vers转+ion表名词→转偏离→转向
diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
stems_affixes.word_buile: versatile[adj.通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的]+ity表名词→n.多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
